sentences.en: Beattie managed to collar Atkins in a hallway.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂设法在走廊里拦住了阿特金斯，和他谈了几句话。

sentences.en: He bundled the old lady into her hallway and brutally attacked her.
sentences.cn: 他将老妇人推到她家走廊上，并对她一顿暴打。

sentences.en: He changed direction swiftly, turned into the hallway and headed her off.
sentences.cn: 他迅速改变方向，拐进走廊截住了她。

sentences.en: He entered the hallway and stood uncertainly.
sentences.cn: 他走进门厅，犹疑地停了下来。

sentences.en: He stood in the narrow hallway just outside the door.
sentences.cn: 他就站在门外狭窄的走廊里。

sentences.en: I found his jacket, which was hanging up in the hallway.
sentences.cn: 我找到了他那件夹克衫，就在门厅里挂着。

sentences.en: I happened to bump into Mervyn Johns in the hallway.
sentences.cn: 我在走廊里意外碰见了默文·约翰斯。

sentences.en: I looked down the hallway to room number nine.
sentences.cn: 我顺着走廊看了一眼9号房。

sentences.en: She climbed the steps and proceeded along the upstairs hallway.
sentences.cn: 她爬上楼梯，顺着楼上的走廊走去。

sentences.en: She walked into the cool of the hallway.
The basement hallway is painted a warm yellow.
sentences.cn: 地下室的走廊漆成了暖黄色。

sentences.en: The hallway ran the length of the villa.
The restroom is at the end of the hallway to the right.
sentences.cn: 洗手间在走廊尽头右转的地方.

sentences.en: The room connects with the dining hall by means of a hallway.
sentences.cn: 这房间通过一条过道与餐厅相连.

sentences.en: There were low, muffled voices rising from the hallway.
sentences.cn: 从走廊里隐约传来了低沉的说话声。

sentences.en: They took the lift up to the third floor and walked along the quiet hallway.
sentences.cn: 他们乘电梯到了3楼，然后走过寂静的过道。

trans.tran_en: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms
